subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Unlike elsewhere, races for females are more popular than those for males in France, mainly because the French Oaks for 3-year-old fillies has been the proving ground for stars with staying power.
snippet: Unlike elsewhere, races for females are more popular than those for males in France, mainly because the French Oaks for 3-year-old fillies has been the proving ground for stars with staying power.
